questions.question: This arc features the Straw Hat Pirates' separation and subsequent two-year hiatus, as well as the introduction of the Eleven Supernovas. What is...?
In this arc, the Straw Hat Pirates face a challenge against a Warlord of the Sea known for his ability to turn people into toys. What is...?
Set on an island dominated by a tyrannical Warlord, this arc introduces the character Law and features the Straw Hats battling against Caesar Clown. What is...?
This ability, used by a member of the Straw Hat crew, allows for the creation and manipulation of soap and bubbles. What is...?
This technique allows its user to multiply their limbs and heads, as seen used by a certain Marine officer. What is...?
This ability is a special Paramecia type Devil Fruit that allows the user to interact with the soul and lifespan of themselves and others. What is...?
This character, the former captain of the Heart Pirates, is known for his ability to grant eternal youth with the Ope Ope no Mi. Who is...?
This character, a former Warlord of the Sea, is known for his sand manipulation powers and role as a key antagonist in the Alabasta arc. Who is...?
This leader of the Beasts Pirates, known for his immense strength and Dragon-Dragon Fruit power, is one of the Four Emperors of the Sea. Who is...?
